channel.title: Silver Eye question....
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Silver Eye question...."

item.title: Re: Silver Eye question....
item.content:encoded: Thanks^^ I just got the same information. It's true, it only activates if the don't have their native Advanced Ressource^^

item.title: Re: Silver Eye question....
item.content:encoded: i believe that the village being targeted by the invasion cannot have advanced resources in order for it to activate. i don't have it to check but that's what i've heard.

item.title: Silver Eye question....
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys,

I was wondering whether there was some special condition to be fulfilled when it comes down to Claymore-Invasionsâ€¦

I was doing quite a few invasions over the last few weeks, and despite pulling all 5 ressources my Claymore did not sap the Lifeblood from their Village. Can someone enlighten me on this matter please? I'm quite the Claymore manga fan, so I really want to get the bloodline^^

Thanks in advance,

greetz, Rand
